item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Mark and I work @BuzzFeed as a Senior Software Engineer (formerly Principal Engineer @BBCNews). keybase.io/integralist I’m a published author of five books (three through Apress and two self-published via Leanpub): Pro Vim Tmux Taster Quick Clojure: Effective Functional Programming Programming in Clojure Python for Programmers For more details on my work history, please refer to my resume

item.title: Resume
item.description: Hello, my name is Mark and I work @BuzzFeed as a Senior Software Engineer (formerly Principal Engineer @BBCNews). I’m also a published author with Apress and LeanPub: Apress Pro Vim Tmux Taster Quick Clojure: Effective Functional Programming LeanPub Python for Programmers Programming in Clojure Connect You can find me online at the following locations: integralist.co.uk github.com/integralist twitter.com/integralist keybase.io/integralist linkedin.com/mark-mcdonnell History BuzzFeed (June 2016 - present) The journey has just begun…
